name: Alabaster Veil
description: Places Protect, Shell, Haste, and Regen on a single ally.

name: Aqua Breath
description: Deals water damage to all enemies.

name: Aura
description: Reduces physical damage received and increases ATK for a single ally.

name: Battle Orders
description: Switches rows for all allies.

name: Boost Jump
description: Attacks from the air to deal heavy damage. Cannot be attacked while jumping.

name: Bonecrusher
description: Either makes self impervious to normal attacks or take heavy damage and fiercely counter attacks until next turn.

name: Capoeira
description: Attacks with a random ability.

name: Dark
description: Deals dark damage to a single/all enemy(ies).

name: Dark Judgement
description: Deals damage to all enemies equal to one-quarter of current HP.

name: Dark Star
description: Deals dark damage to all enemies.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Deals ice damage to a single target and causes time to stop, preventing action.

name: Dispelga
description: Removes magic effects from all enemies.

name: Esunaga
description: Removes all status effects from all allies.

name: Final Heaven
description: Deals holy damage to a single enemy.

name: Full Cure
description: Restores all HP and removes all status effects for all allies.

name: Gale Crescent
description: Deals wind damage to all enemies.

name: Gigaflare
description: Deals magic damage to all enemies.

name: Grand Delta
description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies and inflicts Paralysis, halting actions.

name: Hastega
description: Speeds up the passing of time for all allies.

name: Lai
description: Deals damage and instantly kills a single enemy.

name: ID Break
description: Attacks a single target and inflicts Silence, preventing spell casting.

name: Life Divider
description: Damages a single enemy then restores that enemy’s HP.

name: Lively Lied
description: Restores HP for all allies and enemies.

name: Magic Bomb
description: Deals magic damage to a single target.

name: Magic Bomb 2
description: Deals magic damage to a single enemy. Stronger than Magic Bomb.

name: Magic Bomb 3
description: Deals magic damage to a single enemy. Stronger than Magic Bomb 2.

name: Magic Missile
description: Deals magic damage to a single target.

name: Malediction
description: Inflicts all statuses afflicted on self to a single enemy.

name: Mega Raise
description: Revives all allies and restores half of their maximum HP.

name: Meltdown
description: Deals fire damage to all allies and enemies.

name: Midareyuki
description: Attacks a single enemy three times.

name: Mighty Wall
description: Reduces physical and magic damage received and raises ATK of all allies.

name: Misty Charge
description: Attacks a single enemy with an unfailing blow and switches character’s row.

name: Moogle Dance
description: Decreases DEF and RES of all enemies.

name: Nab Gil
description: Attacks an enemy and steals gil.

name: Phantom Rush
description: Attack a single enemy six times.

name: Piercing Blast
description: Deals magic damage to a single target. Passes through reflect.

name: Sange
description: Attacks an enemy for a number of times equal to the number of own images.

name: Self Destruct
description: Deals damage to a single target equal to own HP and causes self to be knocked out.

name: Shock
description: Deals magic damage to all enemies.

name: Smash
description: Deals heavy damage to a single enemy and causes their wait time to increase.

name: Steal Hearts
description: Inflicts Confuse on all enemies. Sometimes fails and inflicts Berserk on self.

name: Sunder Earth
description: Deals heavy earth damage to a single target. Likely to miss.

name: Taunt
description: Causes Berserk to all enemies and causes enemy attacks to target self.

name: Tempest
description: Deals wind damage to a single target.

name: Thunder Slash
description: Deals lightning damage to a single enemy.

name: Valiant Blow
description: Deals damage to a single enemy. Damage increases as HP decreases.

name: White Draw
description: Consumes MP to restore MP to all allies.

name: White Wind
description: Restores all allies’ HP based on own HP.
